fields.name: Small Family Parcel
fields.description: By selecting this item you will be donating a small family parcel, you will help feed a family of 1-2 people for 3-5 days. Please note: the worth of food and the items in this food parcel change over time.

fields.name: Medium Family Parcel
fields.description: By selecting this item you will be donating a medium family parcel, you will help feed a family of 2-4 people for 3-5 days. Please note: the worth of food and the items in this food parcel change over time.

fields.name: Medium Family Parcel
fields.description: By selecting this item you will be donating a large family parcel, you will help feed a family of 4+ people for 3-5 days. Please note: the worth of food and the items in this food parcel change over time.
